investment.subtitle: Our service does.
investment.quote: We don't sell hours. We buy your freedom.
investment.tier_essentials_desc: For those who demand impeccable coordination of their daily needs.
investment.tier_essentials_legal: Rates are for personal assistance and logistical coordination services. Mobility support is included as an ancillary service.
investment.tier_signature_desc: The ultimate expression of logistical serenity: the unexpected ceases to exist.
investment.tier_signature_legal: Assignment time inclusive of coordination, oversight, and real-time variable management.
investment.tier_elite_desc: For those who no longer wish to wonder, "Can I call him?"
investment.comparison_subtitle: Why management is different from mere transport.
investment.comparison_standard_feat2: Only transfer from point to point
investment.comparison_prive_feat2: Active management of agenda and contingencies
investment.comparison_prive_feat3: Fee based on availability and assistance
investment.comparison_legal: Insolito PrivÃ© operates exclusively within Personal Services (Ateco 96.99.99), providing logistical assistance and lifestyle consulting. Mobility support is an ancillary and instrumental component of the assistance service.
investment.guarantees_subtitle: Always. In every tier. Without exceptions.
investment.faq1_q: Why are costs higher than a standard transport service?
investment.faq1_a: We don't sell routes, but time architecture and logistical serenity. While a standard service merely drives, we coordinate your agenda, actively manage every contingency, and guarantee total protection of your privacy.
investment.faq2_q: Can I request a simple A to B transfer?
investment.faq2_a: Our model is based on continuous personal assistance (Minimum 3h). We don't provide single 'point-to-point' rides because our value lies in the Guardian's constant availability throughout the entire assignment period.
investment.faq3_q: What happens in case of unexpected events?
investment.faq3_a: We can't control the external world, but we can control our response to it. We constantly monitor every variable in real-time. If an obstacle arises, we immediately activate backup protocols to minimize impact on your schedule. Our mission is that you never have to worry about finding a solution: we've already found it.
investment.faq4_q: What type of vehicles do you use?
investment.faq4_a: We exclusively use vehicles that guarantee a 'moving lounge' standard, equipped for work or absolute relaxation. The vehicle is an ancillary tool provided to ensure maximum confidentiality and safety during the assistance service.
investment.faq5_q: How are my data and privacy managed?
investment.faq5_a: Every assignment is protected by a formal non-disclosure commitment (NDA). Your identity and movements are treated with security protocols exceeding legal standards, because discretion is our main product.

services.title: Our Services
services.desc_airport: We eliminate every friction upon your arrival. A dedicated assistant manages your greeting and logistical coordination, ensuring a seamless transition to your destination.
services.desc_hourly: Your personal assistant at your disposal for errands, business meetings, or shopping tours. Total flexibility to adapt to your rhythms.
services.desc_event: Experience Milan and Bergamo's nightlife without compromise. Constant presence and dedicated assistance to guarantee an exclusive experience and protected return.
services.desc_city: Long-distance journeys managed with utmost care. Your travel time becomes productive or restorative.
services.desc_wedding: Exclusive coordination for your big day. Every detail curated with elegance and impeccable precision.
